scripts.debug: npm run clean:release && npm run static && npm run js && npm run css
scripts.build: npm run static:min && npm run css:min && npm run js:min
scripts.static: cp app/src/index.html app/release/index.html && place app/release/index.html js/Main.js main.js && place app/release/index.html less/style.css style.css
scripts.static:min: npm run static && place app/release/index.html style.css style.min.css && place app/release/index.html main.js main.min.js
scripts.js:min: npm run js && babel --preset minify app/release/main.js > app/release/main.min.js
